## ErrorX.resetConfig() method

Reset global configuration to null. Useful for testing or when you want to clear all configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static resetConfig(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

## Example


```typescript
ErrorX.resetConfig()
const config = ErrorX.getConfig() // null
```
